projects.title: HoloHelmet
projects.description: A modified Hololens that safely and securely connects to a standard hard hat to make AR usable in the construction field.

projects.description: App prototype for the K2O brand that features a store, game and blog updates. Designed by James Hall-Collins and developed by Gentry Demchak.

projects.title: Peppers Ghost Game Station
projects.description: A custom arcade cabinet that features 4 knobs. Capable of playing pong and viewing 3D shapes.

projects.title: Wearable PCB Pipe Organ
projects.description: First project with arduino. The backpack serves as an emotional augmentation device, activating loud pipe organs when it's wearer is distressed.

projects.description: Prototype for a sustainable, modular, open source personal go bag for disaster relief.

projects.title: Waste to Food
